ygData.subject: Re: Bone chips
ygData.msgSnippet: We also have the *cheapest* pet component by far...and yes, there is a limitless supply...they re called newbies. :) Go into nektulous and auction that you re
ygData.messageBody:
We also have the *cheapest* pet component by far...and yes, there is a
limitless supply...they're called newbies. :)

Go into nektulous and auction that you're buying bone chips at 1p per 10,
newbies will *flock* to you.

----- Original Message -----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 9:03 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Bone chips


> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
> Unfortunately no. You may find bone chips on vendors,
> but its only because players have sold some back. This
> is one of the complaints that is being petitioned
> about all the time by necros, since every other pet
> class has unlimited supply vendors, while we don't.
